item.title: The Safety of the Gospel Law
item.description: On this occasion I speak with a profound desire that what I say will in some way help us to gain peace in this world and eternal life in the world to come.

item.title: The Governing Ones
item.description: My dear brethren, this is a thrilling hour. At no time has there been a gathering such as this of the elect sons of God. Were it not for the power of the Spirit, I could not bear up the weight of this moment.

item.title: Sanctification through Missionary Service
item.description: I solemnly testify to you that God the Eternal Father and His Son, Jesus Christ, have appeared in this dispensation. These two glorious personages actually stood before and spoke to the young man Joseph Smith.

item.title: How Do You Know?
item.description: I proclaim unto you that I know there is a God in the heaven. He is our Father. We are His children, begotten in His image and likeness. We are His seed and have the potential within us to become as He is.

item.title: Selfless Service
item.description: The young people of a certain ward had worked to earn the large sum of money needed to go on an adventure trip.

item.title: Unclutter Your Life
item.description: On our present assignment, my wife and I live a long way away from our children. This means the letters go back and forth. I would like to read a paragraph from a letter one of our daughters recently sent:

item.title: Righteousness
item.description: No other feeling in the soul of man can bring the joy and happiness than that of knowing you are doing all you can to become righteous.
